short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Override the new tab page with a Lisk branded one. Share the Lisk brand and say up to date by using the community channels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to support Lisk? Use this fancy new tab launcher! 

This extension is created by Marijn Bent.
